verbose_text: To investigate whether the comparatively very low activity of the PI5P4Kgamma isoform is due to the fact that it has a reduced ability (compared with the other two isoforms) to interact with or phosphorylate PtdIns5P, or whether it is actually a disabled kinase enzyme (i.e. poor in binding to or utilizing ATP), the intrinsic ATPase activity of all three isoforms was measured (XREF_FIG).
